items.description: Joined the Azure PaaS team as a Support Engineer for the ARM product.
Joined the company's graduate program as a CRM Javascript Developer and progressed to a Front-End Developer role after being positively reviewed for work performed on a Housing Solution.

items.role: MSc in Electrical and Computer Engineering @ FEUP
items.description: Moved from Madeira Island to Porto to study Electrical and Computer Engineering. After 2018, specialized in Telecommunications, Computers and Electronics - Multimedia and Communications. In 2021 delivered [An Analysis of Performance Recipes in C Applications](/docs/dissertation.pdf), where I describe the impact of code refactoring techniques in the execution time, energy consumption and cache efficiency of C benchmarks and proposed automated scripts, written in [LARA](https://specs.fe.up.pt/tools/clava/doc/#) and ran in [Clava](https://specs.fe.up.pt/tools/clava/), to apply said refactoring techniques.

Took this course when I wondered how APIs come to be - how data can be exchanged at given endpoints and where it could be stored. Learned about MongoDB and Express.js to complete my MEVN tech stack and deployed my work to [this website](https://ngomes-apis-and-microservices.herokuapp.com/).

items.role: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification
items.description: My learning path on Web Development started here, when I became interested in learning markup, styling and Javascript to create the [first version of this Portfolio](/docs/v1.png).
